title_statement.title: National Income Dynamics Study - All Waves

study_info.abstract: The National Income Dynamics Study (NIDS) is South Africa's first national longitudinal household survey tracking the socio-economic well-being of South Africans across five waves. The study includes comprehensive questionnaires in 11 official South African languages (English, Afrikaans, isiZulu, isiXhosa, Setswana, Sepedi, Siswati, Tshivenda, and Xitsonga), covering income, employment, education, health, and household characteristics.
study_info.geog_coverage: Nationally representative sample covering all nine provinces of South Africa with urban and rural representation
study_info.data_kind: Longitudinal survey data with panel design
study_info.universe: All individuals in surveyed households aged 15 years and above, tracking same households across waves
